name: Until Exodus
description: Until Exodus is a wave based horror shooter set in a dystopian world. The last of humanity have been residing in a bunker underground as creatures mutated and twisted by technology interlope the surface. After a fateful breach in the bunker forces the survivors to evacuate, you are called upon to keep the last source of power online so that the survivors can escape. Fight hordes of creatures and utilise a variety of weapons and defences to keep the monsters at bay as you pave the way for humanity's survival.
